text: The primary purposes of a commercial kitchen ventilation system are simple: remove smoke and grease, and keep the air cool. But today’s operators are asking a lot more of these systems. With an eye on operating costs and labor challenges, energy use and overall comfort are top of mind. And of course, making sure the air inside and out not only smells clean but is safe to breathe is a priority for many consumers. Foodservice design consultants and manufacturers of CKV equipment understand the nuances involved in designing successful ventilation systems. A combination of equipment engineered to address these issues and creativity in kitchen ventilation design help operators find kitchen ventilation systems to fit their budgets and priorities. To serve as a springboard for those in the market for ventilation equipment, FER dug into a couple recent projects for which creative ventilation was imperative. SMART TECHNOLOGY ALLOWS FOR FLEXIBILITY Walk through the food hall of City Foundry STL in St. Louis and you’ll find a world of food offerings, from Bombay sliders to West African fried plantains, New Orleans po’boys to South American empanadas, as well as burgers, tacos, pizza, waffles and, of course, the city’s signature dish: fried ravioli. Seventeen different restaurant concepts making use of 15 kitchens are a big part of the revitalization of this building (previously a site where castings were made for household appliance manufacturers). Upon finding the roof of the building constructed in 1929 was not structurally strong enough to support 15 individual exhaust systems, the design team got creative. They designed the kitchen ventilation systems for City Foundry STL using only two exhaust systems. The 15 exhaust hoods from each kitchen area tie into two separate hood banks, with nine on one fan and six on the other. Crews installed the exhaust systems in a mechanical space to the side of the building, keeping everything off the roof. “We couldn’t have done this type of system without the smart connect features and IoT available today.” The key to success in this system is the fact that each hood operates independently of each other on its own smart control system, ramping up or cycling down according to the amount of production going on under each hood. “We couldn’t have done this type of system without the smart connect features and IoT available today,” says the manufacturer. “If nine hoods were all exhausting at full capacity to one system at once you’d have more than 18,000 cfm exhausting all the time, which would be a big waste of energy. In this case we are able to measure exhaust in real time and adjust the amount of makeup air according to the type of cooking being done under each hood.” In the end, the facility found savings not only from an infrastructure standpoint of not having to purchase and install 15 exhaust fans and accompanying risers, but also from operational savings over time as a result of well-regulated airflow. The system also allows flexibility. During the design phase the future tenants were unknown, which meant the team designed each hood to capture and contain a maximum amount of exhaust. Using demand control ventilation allows operators to adjust each hood individually to manage airflow on an as-needed basis. PRIORITIZING NOISE LEVELS When the time came to add equipment to an existing kitchen at Kendall College in Chicago, noise levels were a top priority. The team wanted the ability to talk to each other without yelling over a loud fan, whether working on new curriculum and recipes or teaching students a process. In this installation the only new equipment was the exhaust hood, as it was connecting to the existing makeup air unit. The team chose a hood designed to arch over the cooking equipment, where the curved surface allows air to glide across rather than being sucked up into a small space, which reduces the amount of air being moved, thus making less noise. The new hood brought additional benefits. The arched design also leads to improved energy efficiency, as moving less air means less new air to heat and cool. Another benefit to this design comes in replacing filters, which are easily accessed at the front of the hood rather than up against the back of the wall, eliminating the need to climb over equipment for routine maintenance. Test kitchens aren’t the only place where controlling noise makes an impact. Operators at retirement facilities find traditional systems often produce feedback for patrons who wear hearing aids. And as employee comfort becomes a top concern, quieter kitchens make for a more satisfying workplace environment. Operators have a few options when it comes to specifying quieter hoods. In addition to the arched design, another manufacturer also capitalized on noise reduction by designing a hood with a larger extractor profile. The original purpose for the new design was to increase grease extraction capability, but in changing the design parameters the static resistance of air moving through the extractor decreased, leading to an exhaust system operating about 15 decibels quieter than traditional hoods. WHEN SPACE IS AT A PREMIUM From ghost kitchens with high production levels to traditional operations trying to do more with less, space is a driving force of kitchen design. Luckily, there are options in exhaust systems that bring the necessary amount of power and comfort while taking up less space than traditional systems. One manufacturer recommends considering dedicated outdoor air systems for kitchen ventilation when space is a premium. Rather than having a makeup air unit and a rooftop exhaust, everything is included in one piece of equipment. Not only do you save money on installation costs, but there are cost savings in maintenance with half as many filters to purchase and a fewer amount of parts to fail. Exhaust hoods featuring integrated pollution control also save space by taking away the need for a stand-alone pollution control unit. “Many cities have instated codes requiring a certain level of air scrubbing to remove smoke and odor,” explains one manufacturer. “But we’re also seeing an increase in high-density housing with foodservice operations on the first floor that have increased the growth of this technology.” GETTING THE RIGHT DESIGN Making the choice on smart systems, DOAS and pollution control units can seem overwhelming. The manufacturers FER spoke with provided their insight to help make the process easier. Here are their top tips: • Understand where your priorities lie in regard to the cost of equipment, energy costs over time, and employee and patron comfort. Knowing this type of information from the beginning helps in choosing the proper equipment for long-term satisfaction. • Make sure to understand the cost of operation in addition to purchase price and installation of equipment. Otherwise, you might find that cutting corners during construction only leads to higher maintenance and operating costs in the long run. • Design for the future. Consider allowing enough overhang for changes in equipment under the hood. • Share your expectations for the design from the start of the project, and stay involved throughout the process. The good news: With today’s products and technology, the number of combinations that can be used effectively are limitless. Get a Sense Put varied products from four ventilation manufacturers on your radar to learn what they can handle.

text: Researchers design and evaluate plastic recycling processes that are efficient, effective, and suitable for various types of plastic waste and usage contexts. Improved plastic recycling systems reduce waste and pollution while increasing product durability and attracting public awareness. In addition, plastic recycling systems play a pivotal role in diverting plastic waste away from landfills and oceans, preserving the ecosystem, and mitigating plastic pollution. This article provides you with data-driven insights about top plastic recycling examples based on our analysis of 1125 emerging plastic recycling companies & technologies and their impact on 10 industries. Tree Map reveals the Impact of Plastic Recycling on 10 Industries The Tree Map below illustrates the top examples of plastic recycling across 10 industries in 2023 and 2024. The plastic recycling use cases across the construction and manufacturing industries enable access to low-cost materials, reducing overall costs. In the packaging, food, beverage, fashion, and retail industries, plastic recycling drives sustainability and environmental enhancement while empowering operational efficiency. Recycled plastic in the construction industry enables low-cost construction materials and contributes to the energy industry through solutions like plastic-to-fuel technologies. Within the sports and agriculture industry, recycled plastic finds use in the manufacture of sustainable equipment. Finally, the healthcare industry leverages novel recycling methods to recover plastic from medical waste and create medical devices and alternative packages. Interested to explore all 1100+ plastic recycling startups & scaleups? Book Demo Global Startup Heat Map covers 1125 Plastic Recycling Startups & Scaleups The Global Startup Heat Map below highlights the global distribution of the 1125 exemplary startups & scaleups that we analyzed for this research. Created through the StartUs Insights Discovery Platform that covers 3 790 000+ startups & scaleups globally, the Heat Map reveals that the UK has a high concentration of plastic recycling startups, followed by the US. Below, you get to meet 10 out of these 1125 promising startups & scaleups as well as the solutions they develop. These plastic recycling solutions are hand-picked based on criteria such as founding year, location, funding raised, & more. Depending on your specific needs, your top picks might look entirely different. Top Plastic Recycling Applications across 10 Industries (2023 & 2024) 1. Packaging The packaging industry uses plastic recycling technologies to reduce environmental impact as well as material and energy per unit of output. It ensures a circular economy for plastics and reduces waste generation. Packaging companies are investing in glue dots, laser etching, water-soluble films, and edible coatings to make their product more recycling-friendly. Companies also leverage recycled plastics to manufacture containers, bags, and films. These products are as durable and functional as those made from virgin plastic. Plastic recycling within the packaging industry continues to grow as consumers demand more sustainable products and regulations become stricter. Shiki Wrap provides Recycled Plastic Wrap US-based startup Shiki Wrap makes reusable gift wrap materials and bags from recycled plastic. The startup uses soft and flexible fabric to create Japanese Furoshiki design-based gift wrapping. The fabric is woven from recycled plastic bottles, making it durable, water-resistant, and easy to wrap with. The wrap comes in multiple designs and sizes as well as supports various use cases such as wrapping beverage bottles and using it as a tote bag. Additionally, the wrap is washable and reusable, reducing waste and promoting sustainability. 2. Manufacturing Integrating recycled plastic into manufacturing workflows reduces waste, saves resources, and improves operational sustainability. Manufacturing businesses are adopting mechanical and chemical plastic recycling technologies. The recycled plastic replaces virgin materials and supports 3D printing or injection molding workflows. Such solutions reduce the environmental impact of the production process. Incorporating recycled plastic into manufacturing processes also diverts plastic waste from landfills or incineration. Additionally, recycling plastic reduces the need for energy-intensive processes involved in the production of virgin plastic, resulting in lower greenhouse gas emissions. Printerior advances Sustainable 3D Printing Printerior is a US-based startup that manufactures 3D printer filament for small-scale and large-format 3D prints using recycled plastic. The startup’s recycled polyethylene terephthalate glycol (rPETG) filament is optimal for 3D printing applications. It features the strength and durability of styrene and the malleability of polylactic acid (PLA). Printerior sources the waste plastic from industrial waste streams consisting of plastic bottles and food containers. The startup also adds glycol to eliminate the crystallization of the material while printing. Printerior helps manufacturing brands reduce their environmental impact while saving manufacturing costs and time. 3. Food & Beverage Companies within the food and beverage industry are deploying plastic recycling technologies to reduce plastic waste and promote sustainability. Recycled plastic finds use in food packages like bottles, trays, and containers. Brands usually make these products from recycled high-density polyethylene (HDPE). Recycled HDPE is food-safe, making it suitable for use in food packaging applications. Additionally, restaurants use recycled plastic for sustainable utensils, such as cutlery and straws, which are increasingly popular among environmentally conscious consumers. Using recycled plastic in restaurant products thus promotes the brands’ image as environmentally responsible and attracts more customers. ZenWTR produces Recycled Plastic Beverage Bottles US-based startup ZenWTR makes recycled ocean-bound plastic bottles for its alkaline water. The startup sources the plastic from at-risk coastal environments, preventing waste from reaching and polluting the ocean. Moreover, it uses ocean-bound plastic instead of ocean-retrieved plastic as exposure to the sun and salt degrades plastic. Zen WTR ensures that the bottle, closure, and label are recyclable, minimizing the environmental impact. 4. Energy By using chemical recycling, energy businesses convert plastics back into oil and use it to produce new plastics or fuels. Utilities also leverage recycled plastic in the production of solar panels and wind turbines. Wind turbine blades are made from composite materials that include recycled plastic. This reduces the demand for virgin plastic and the environmental impact associated with the manufacturing process. Petroleum companies also employ pyrolysis to convert plastic waste into liquid fuel, which is highly valuable in the energy industry for powering industrial processes and vehicles. Companies focusing on geothermal energy use recycled plastic in the construction of heat pump systems. Hydrogen Utopia facilitates Waste-To-Energy UK-based startup Hydrogen Utopia converts non-recyclable waste plastics into hydrogen and syngas products using a multi-stage thermal process. The technology operates in a sealed, oxygen-free environment, requiring no sorting or cleaning of the plastic feedstock. The startup heats the plastic to undergo the transition to a vapor phase and then to syngas containing hydrogen, methane, and carbon oxides. Hydrogen Utopia then extracts the hydrogen and purifies it. It also uses syngas as a base chemical for generating heat or power during this process. Additionally, the startup uses green electricity to power this technology and eliminate carbon emissions. Hydrogen Utopia provides consumers and utilities with an alternative energy source while also addressing the environmental threat of plastic waste. 5. Fashion Clothing brands are employing plastic recycling to transform plastic waste into high-performance fabrics. Some businesses use clear polyethylene terephthalate (PET) bottles to make polyester yarns while others use dyed and recycled polythene bags to weave comfortable textiles. The usage of recycled polyester in fashion reduces plastic waste and pollution, as well as decreases the demand for new plastics. Such modified fabrics find use in innerwear, outerwear, and even high-end fashion. They are durable, easy to care for, and have a lower environmental impact than virgin polyester. Additionally, apparel brands leverage recycled plastic to create accessories such as jewelry, bags, and eyewear frames. As consumer awareness regarding environmental issues increases, using recycled plastic in fashion products becomes an attractive selling point. Incorporating recycled plastic enables fashion companies to align with consumer values and gain a competitive advantage. Oceanness offers Recycled Ocean Plastic-based Clothing Oceanness is a Norwegian apparel startup that creates eco-friendly clothing from recycled plastic bottles and ocean plastic. Its proprietary technology transforms plastic waste into soft and durable fabrics. Due to their hydrophobic composition, the clothing transports moisture away from the skin through capillary action. Hence the fabric pulls moisture, including sweat, away from the skin, where it evaporates more easily. Oceanness’s plastic recycling technology allows fashion brands to align with sustainability goals and provide high-quality clothing. 6. Construction Innovations in sustainable construction include the use of renewable materials like bamboo and reclaimed wood, advanced insulation systems, green roofs, and solar energy. Additionally, the implementation of efficient water management systems, such as rainwater harvesting and greywater recycling, ensures water conservation. Technologies like building information modeling (BIM) and digital tools enable optimized designs and reduce material waste. Further, prefabrication and modular construction methods minimize construction time and waste. These innovations prioritize energy efficiency, reduce carbon emissions, and promote sustainable practices throughout the construction lifecycle. NovoEarth develops Building Materials from Plastic Waste Indian startup NovoEarth converts non-recyclable plastic waste into durable building materials. Using its proprietary technology, the startup converts multi-layered packaging (MLP) waste into NovoBoards. The startup’s NovoBoard is a recyclable alternative usable for various applications such as furniture, flooring, and roofing. It is water, rust, termite, and fungal-proof as well as works as a fire retardant. NovoEarth’s construction material offers an eco-friendly alternative to conventional materials, contributing to the circular economy and reducing plastic pollution. 7. Retail As consumers demand more sustainable and circular approaches to retail, plastic recycling is a growing trend in the retail industry. Supermarkets and stores opt for shopping baskets, shelf dividers, and carts made from recycled plastic. These durable and reusable alternatives replace traditional baskets and carts made from virgin plastic. They also use it for displays and signages within stores, reducing their environmental impact and delivering a visual message of sustainability to shoppers. By emphasizing their commitment to sustainability, retailers attract specific segments of environmentally conscious consumers. Siddham PolyIndia offers Recycled Plastic Shopping Bags Siddham PolyIndia is an Indian startup that recycles plastic waste to produce high-quality granules for the retail industry. It sorts, cleans, washes, and removes metal and moisture from discarded plastic bottles. The startup produces it at low temperatures and pressures using ethylene copolymerization. It creates a polymer with a narrower molecular weight distribution than conventional low-density polyethylene (LDPE). The startup then sells the resulting linear low-density polyethylene (LLDPE) to retail companies for various applications. Retail companies use LLDPE mainly to manufacture recycled plastic bags for shopping and garbage collection. 8. Agriculture Farmers use mulch films made from recycled plastic to prevent weed growth, conserve moisture, and increase soil temperature. This leads to improved crop growth and yields. Agritech companies also use recycled plastic in greenhouses as a covering material due to their cost-effectiveness and durability. They also use recycled polyethylene to create films or sheets to provide insulation and regulate the temperature in greenhouses. Recycled plastic also finds use in the manufacturing of growing containers, trays, or pots. Agribusinesses further utilize recycled plastic to make irrigation pipes and drip tape, lowering the amount of plastic waste. NoWaste offers a Plastic Waste Recycling Platform US-based startup NoWaste develops a recycling platform that facilitates the transformation of agricultural plastics and residues into raw materials. It allows farmers to deliver their waste for recycling on demand before it becomes unusable. NoWaste uses data-driven analysis to optimize logistics. This involves the collection and analysis of the location of farmers, the type and quantity of agricultural plastic waste generated, and the availability and capacity of recyclers and plastic producers. By leveraging this data, NoWaste’s platform effectively connects farmers with the most suitable recyclers and plastic producers in their vicinity. This provides a cost-effective and sustainable way to close the loop of agricultural plastic waste. 9. Sports Plastic recycling in the sports industry reduces the environmental impact of plastic waste generated during sporting events. Many sports organizations and venues are adopting measures to avoid or minimize single-use plastic items like straws, packaging, and cutlery. Sports equipment manufacturers are also creating new products from recycled plastic. They include footballs, tennis rackets, protective padding, ski boots, etc. These products are more durable and lightweight than their metallic or wooden counterparts, making them easier for sportspeople to handle. Brands also use recycled plastic to create high-performance active-wear materials to meet the specific needs of different sports. In addition to reducing waste and greenhouse gas emissions, the use of recycled plastic in sports equipment also reduces costs. Weekendbee manufactures Activewear from Recycled Plastic Weekendbee is a Finnish startup that creates sustainable sportswear. The startup utilizes recycled plastic bottles and other eco-friendly materials to create high-quality clothing for various sporting activities. It also partners with brands to convert plastic waste into fabrics that are durable, breathable, and comfortable, making it more flexible and sweat-proof. The startup’s technology reduces water consumption, carbon emissions, and waste in the production process of activewear. 10. Healthcare Even though recycling companies do not generally recycle medical plastic due to contamination concerns, medical companies are now designing recycle-friendly plastics for medical applications. Hospitals are working with recycling companies to keep medical plastics out of unregulated waste. With newer decontamination and detoxification techniques, it is also possible to crush and recycle old medical equipment. Recycled plastic finds use in the production of disposable personal protective equipment (PPE), such as masks, gowns, and gloves. Prosthetics brands also employ recycled plastic in prosthetics and implant manufacturing, providing an affordable alternative for patients. Med-X facilitates Medical Waste Recycling Australian startup Med-X provides a sustainable solution for recycling medical plastic waste. Using the patented SharpCYCLE technology, Med-X converts plastic waste into recycled plastic pellets for manufacturing new medical products. SharpCYCLE is a closed-loop system that collects, shreds, washes, and extrudes plastic waste on-site. This reduces the environmental impact and cost of waste disposal in medical facilities like hospitals. The startup’s containers are made of puncture-resistant material and feature an automatic overfill prevention mechanism, eliminating risks during the transportation of sharps to and from patients. SharpCYCLE recycling system offers an efficient and sustainable solution for the management and recycling of single-use sharps containers, contributing to sustainability in healthcare settings. Discover All Plastic Recycling Startups Advanced sorting systems leverage AI and machine learning to enable more accurate identification and separation of plastics. This increases the efficiency of the recycling process. Additionally, chemical recycling techniques like pyrolysis and depolymerization simplify the breakdown of plastic waste into its constituent parts. Companies are also resorting to solvent-based and enzymatic recycling to recover plastic monomers. The combination of improved sorting and advanced recycling will lead to a closed-loop recycling system. text: INTRODUCTION India is one of the world’s leading countries in producing speciality chemicals, with many leading companies operating in the sector. The country has a wide range of manufacturers specialising in different areas, such as pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, dyes and intermediates. These companies are well-known for their high-quality products and commitment to innovation. As of 2023, there are over 150 speciality chemical companies in the Indian market, providing various products for industrial and commercial applications. Some of the leading names in this field include Hindustan Organic Chemicals, Aarti Industries, UPL Limited, Bayer CropScience, Atul Ltd, Gharda Chemicals, and PI Industries. All these companies offer advanced technologies and solutions tailored to individual customer needs. They also have comprehensive safety procedures and standards for handling hazardous or toxic substances. In addition, many of these companies are also involved in research and development activities, offering new and improved products for the industry. IMPORTANCE Speciality chemicals companies in India have become increasingly important in 2023. In a country with diverse climates, geography and industry needs, speciality chemicals can provide solutions for specific applications. Speciality chemicals companies in India produce products used in paints, coatings, inks, lubricants, additives and other industries. They also serve as raw materials for pharmaceuticals and cosmetics. The demand for speciality chemicals is growing as the Indian economy expands, allowing more and more companies to fulfil their customers’ needs. As a result, speciality chemicals companies in India are creating new opportunities for growth and innovation. The Indian government has taken steps to promote the development of speciality chemicals companies, including financial incentives and tax breaks. The industry is also supported by research and development initiatives, which allow them to develop innovative products and technologies. As consumer demands continue to grow, speciality chemicals companies are adopting new strategies to meet customer requirements. In addition, speciality chemicals companies in India are focusing on exports. Export markets are providing an avenue for international growth and development. Exports are helping these companies to expand their presence in foreign markets, thus generating employment opportunities and economic benefits for the country. Overall, speciality chemicals companies in India play an essential role in the country’s growth and development in 2023. With the right strategies, these companies can continue to be successful and contribute to the advancement of the Indian economy. It utilizes advanced technologies, such as biotechnology and nanotechnology, to develop innovative solutions for its customers. BASF India also offers services for research & development, manufacturing, and supply chain management. It is committed to providing tailored solutions that meet customer needs and fulfil local requirements. The company is focused on contributing to sustainable development in India by investing in energy efficiency and reducing water consumption. It is developing multi-disciplinary partnerships with universities, research institutes, and other organizations in India to promote innovation. BASF India is committed to advancing environmental protection, social responsibility, and economic development through its sustainability initiatives. It is actively involved in activities like promoting healthy ecosystems, driving a circular economy, and creating green chemistry solutions. Additionally, the company runs training programs and seminars to create awareness about sustainability among its employees and business partners. In conclusion, BASF India is a global leader in the chemical industry, committed to providing innovative solutions for its customers and promoting sustainability in India through its initiatives. Dow Chemical International Pvt. Ltd. – Dow Chemical International Pvt. Ltd. is a global leader in chemical manufacturing, committed to providing innovative solutions that have the power to help transform industries and improve lives. With over 9,000 employees worldwide and operations in more than 150 countries, the company strives to stay ahead of the curve with sustainable solutions for customers and communities. Dow Chemical produces chemicals, plastics, agricultural products, and consumer products, with products ranging from agrochemicals to automotive components to electronics. The company has established a strong presence in India, with offices in nine major cities nationwide. Dow Chemical International Pvt. Ltd. is committed to working closely with customers to develop custom solutions that solve their most pressing needs. The company is also dedicated to improving India’s environment and empowering the country’s economy by creating jobs and providing training opportunities to local communities. Dow Chemical International Pvt. Ltd. is a leader in sustainability and innovation, leveraging its years of experience and expertise to create products and solutions that help improve the world. Clariant Chemicals India Ltd. – Clariant Chemicals India Ltd is a subsidiary of Clariant AG, a world leader in speciality chemicals. Based in Mumbai, the company produces a range of chemicals and materials for various industries, including agriculture, textiles, automotive and personal care products. Clariant Chemicals India Ltd has over 20 manufacturing sites nationwide, with more than 2,000 employees working in its production facilities. Its products include active ingredients, colourants, surfactants, emulsifiers, polymers, speciality chemicals, biocides, and solvents. It also provides services such as custom synthesis and contract manufacturing. The company is committed to sustainability and actively works towards reducing its carbon footprint. Its “Green & Clean” program focuses on water and energy conservation, waste reduction and pollution control. Clariant Chemicals India Ltd has also earned ISO 9001:2015 certification for its quality management system. Clariant Chemicals India Ltd has a strong presence in the Indian market, with numerous collaborations with leading customers in the country. The company strives to make its products safe, efficient, and sustainable to meet the needs of both local and global markets. In addition, it invests heavily in research and development of new products, technologies and processes to ensure customer satisfaction. Atul Ltd. – Atul Ltd is a multinational corporation based in India that specializes in chemicals, crop protection products, and industrial machinery. Founded in 1954, it has grown to become one of the largest chemical manufacturers in the world, with over 20,000 employees. Atul Ltd offers a wide range of services and products in various categories, including fine chemicals, crop protection products, agrochemicals, speciality chemicals, pharmaceuticals, and engineering products. The company also has its own research and development teams and works with leading universities and research institutions around the world. Atul Ltd has a strong presence in all major markets globally, with offices in more than 50 countries. Its core focus is on developing innovative solutions to serve customer needs and promote sustainable growth. They are committed to delivering quality products and services while minimizing environmental impact. The company also strives to ensure social responsibility by engaging in diverse business practices which respect the rights of their workers and communities. Atul Ltd is a trusted name in the industry for its quality products, customer service, and superior technology. Sud-Chemie India Pvt. Ltd. – Sud-Chemie India Pvt. Ltd. is a leading speciality chemical company based in Mumbai, India. Founded in 1992, the company manufactures and supplies a wide range of chemicals and ingredients to meet the needs of a variety of industries. The company has grown over the years and currently operates four production facilities located in Gujarat, Maharashtra, and Uttar Pradesh. Sud-Chemie India specializes in producing high-quality additives for a variety of industries, including plastics, rubber, textile, paper, paint, coatings, pharmaceuticals, and personal care. Their products also extend to agricultural chemicals such as fertilizers and insecticides, as well as speciality chemicals for the automotive, defence, and food industries. The company works closely with their customers to develop customized solutions for them. With the help of their experienced research & development team, they are able to provide innovative products which are tailored to each individual customer’s specific requirements. This helps them to maintain the highest standards of quality. Sud-Chemie India also offers technical support services to their customers. These services include product consultation, application engineering, process optimization, and troubleshooting. They also have an extensive library of raw materials and formulations that can be used to create new products or improve existing ones. The company is committed to providing products that are safe, sustainable, and environmentally friendly. All their products comply with international standards and regulations. Sud-Chemie India is also certified under ISO 9001:2008 for quality management systems and ISO 14001:2004 for environmental management systems. Overall, Sud-Chemie India Pvt. Ltd. is a reliable partner in providing superior quality chemicals and ingredients for a variety of industries. Through their commitment to quality and innovation, they strive to exceed the expectations of their customers around the world. Evonik Industries AG – Evonik Industries AG is a global leader in speciality chemicals, with over 33,000 employees in more than 100 countries. The company produces a wide range of products, including paints and coatings, nutrition and health products, and performance materials. Evonik’s products are used in virtually every industry, from automotive to construction, personal care, and agriculture. It has a long history of innovation, with several of its products setting benchmark standards in the industry. Its R&D capabilities help it capitalize on trends and anticipate customer needs. Evonik has strong sustainability credentials, committing to reduce its carbon footprint by 30% by 2030. In 2020, it achieved almost 10% reduction in absolute CO2 emissions compared to 2019. Evonik has an extensive global presence, with operations stretching from North America to Europe, Asia Pacific and Central and Latin America. It is also dedicated to corporate social responsibility, regularly supporting local projects, tackling climate change and promoting diversity and inclusion. To further illustrate its dedication, in 2021, the company announced plans to achieve carbon neutrality by 2040. In conclusion, Evonik is a well-known name in the speciality chemicals industry, with a diversified portfolio, a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, and a global reach. Gujarat Alkalies and Chemicals Ltd. – Gujarat Alkalies and Chemicals Ltd. (GACL) is a leading Indian company engaged in the manufacture and marketing of alkalis and other chemicals. The company was established in 1973 and is headquartered in Vadodara, Gujarat. GACL is one of the largest manufacturers of caustic soda, chlorine and other related products in India. It also produces speciality chemicals such as chloro-sulphonic acid, hydrochloric acid, bleaching powder and liquid chlorine. GACL has three manufacturing plants located at Vadodara, Dahej and Vilayat. Its plant at Vadodara manufactures caustic soda, chlorine, sodium hypochlorite, hydrochloric acid, sulphuric acid and chloro-sulphonic acid. The Dahej plant produces chlorine, caustic lye and hydrochloric acid. The Vilayat plant manufactures mainly caustic soda. The company has a well-developed infrastructure for handling various chemicals safely, with safety and environmental protection being given the highest priority. GACL has received many awards and recognitions over the years, including a national award from the Ministry of Chemicals & Fertilizers in 2008. In addition to its manufacturing business, GACL also provides engineering services, including design, construction and commissioning of chemical plants. GACL is committed to providing quality products and excellent customer service, which helps it maintain its position as one of the leading companies in the Indian chemical industry. With its expansive production capacity and reliable supply chain, GACL has consistently met customer expectations in terms of product quality and delivery schedule. SCG Performance Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd. – SCG Performance Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd. is a subsidiary of Thai-based SCG Chemicals, a global leader in the chemical industry. The company specializes in the production and supply of industrial chemicals for the automotive, construction, manufacturing, and oil & gas industries. Located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, the company has a state-of-the-art infrastructure to manufacture and deliver quality products that meet the needs of its customers. The company is ISO 9001 certified for its production process and quality standards. SCG Performance Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd. offers a wide range of products such as resins, dispersions, dispersants, pigments, additives, and more. Their products are used in industries like automotive, construction, packaging, coatings, leather, paints, adhesives, etc. The company invests heavily in R&D and provides customized solutions to its customers. The company has built a strong network of distributors across the country, offering fast and reliable delivery times. The technical team offers extensive support with product selection and application advice. They also provide guidance on product safety, product regulations, formulation, and performance testing. SCG Performance Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd. is committed to providing high-quality products with low environmental impact. They focus on sustainable development by using clean energy sources such as solar and wind power. They use only eco-friendly raw materials and ensure minimal wastage throughout the production process. The company values customer satisfaction above all else and follows ethical practices for better business returns. SCG Performance Chemicals India Pvt. Ltd. is a reliable partner for your chemical requirements. Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. – Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. (GNFC) is a leading chemical and fertilizer company in India, headquartered in the city of Bharuch in Gujarat. The company was founded in 1976 and is part of the Indian Government’s Department of Fertilizers. GNFC produces a wide range of products including fertilizers, agrochemicals, industrial chemicals and speciality chemicals. The company has a strong presence in India and exports to more than 40 countries around the world. GNFC has five production plants located at Bharuch, Ankleshwar, Surat and Dahej. Its flagship plant, Bharuch, is the largest fertilizer manufacturing unit in India and one of the largest single-site ammonia urea complexes in the world. GNFC is also the first fertilizer manufacturer to introduce the use of natural gas for its production process. GNFC has been awarded several prestigious awards for its corporate social responsibility initiatives, such as “The Best Corporate Citizen Award” and “Best Company of the Year” by the Government of India. The company is also renowned for its environmental stewardship and has implemented a number of environment-friendly measures to reduce its eco-footprint. In addition, GNFC has also launched several innovative initiatives to contribute to the community and has taken steps to reduce water consumption and promote sustainable agriculture. GNFC has also established itself as a leader in research and development, conducting several projects related to agrotechnology, biotechnology and industrial biotechnology. The company is committed to making quality products while maintaining an efficient and cost-effective production system. GNFC’s commitment to providing solutions to meet the needs of farmers has made it one of the most sought-after companies in the agrochemical industry. Lotte Chemical India Pvt. Ltd. – Lotte Chemical India Pvt. Ltd. is a part of the Lotte Group, a multinational conglomerate based in South Korea. The company specializes in the production of petrochemicals and plastics. It offers products such as polyethene, polypropylene, polystyrene, engineering plastics and elastomers. The company has its headquarters in Mumbai and operates three manufacturing plants in Manali, Tamil Nadu; Dahej, Gujarat and Rupnagar, Punjab. The company’s core strengths include an experienced management team and modern production facilities, allowing it to provide high-quality products with consistent performance. Its products are used in a variety of applications, including automotive, consumer packaging, building and construction, electrical and electronics and health care. Lotte Chemical India has established strong relationships with suppliers, customers and government agencies. It is committed to environmental protection and sustainability through the reduction of energy consumption and waste generation, as well as water and air pollution control measures. The company also meets global standards for product safety, quality, reliability and efficiency. Additionally, Lotte Chemical India focuses on research and development to develop new products and technologies that meet customer needs. Through continuous innovation and development, the company strives to increase its competitive advantage in the plastic industry. CONCLUSION In 2023, speciality chemicals companies in India are expected to continue growing at a rapid pace. The industry is expected to benefit from the country’s booming economy, increasing purchasing power and favourable government policies. Companies are also investing heavily in research and development, as well as in new technologies and processes, to gain a competitive edge in the market. Additionally, the sector is set to benefit from higher demand for speciality products within India and abroad. As such, more and more companies are entering the market, resulting in increased competition. However, the industry still faces some challenges, such as rising costs of raw materials, regulatory risks, and shortages of skilled labour. Nevertheless, with proper strategies and investments, speciality chemicals companies in India are expected to remain profitable in 2023.

text: INTRODUCTION India is home to many smart home companies offering innovative products and services. Smart home solutions in India are becoming increasingly popular due to their convenience, energy savings, and security benefits. Companies like Wipro, Lutron, MiHome, and Larsen & Toubro are leading the market in providing high-quality, reliable intelligent home solutions. Wipro offers a range of Wi-Fi-enabled devices, including switches, lights, fans, air conditioners, and an app for controlling them. Lutron provides lighting control solutions that can customize rooms according to user preferences. MiHome’s product portfolio includes a range of intelligent appliances for security and automation, such as door locks and automated door openers. Larsen & Toubro’s innovative home solutions enable users to monitor energy consumption and remotely adjust settings. All these companies also offer state-of-the-art home automation systems which can be used to automate everyday tasks and make life easier. With the increasing demand for innovative home solutions in India, more companies are entering the market, bringing innovative products and services. IMPORTANCE Innovative home companies in India will be significant in 2023 as the country continues to become more technologically advanced. The need for intelligent home automation solutions is proliferating, and many Indian companies are at the forefront of this revolution. Innovative home technology can help households save energy, reduce their carbon footprint, and make life easier. In 2023, more Indian households will have access to the latest innovative home technology, allowing them to enjoy a range of features and services such as automated lighting, temperature control, security systems, and voice-activated assistants. With the rise of the Internet of Things (IoT), innovative home companies in India have the potential to offer even more innovative and sophisticated solutions that could revolutionize the way people live. Using machine learning and artificial intelligence, these companies could create products that anticipate user behaviour and automate specific tasks. This will allow users to save time and money and improve the quality of life for many Indians. Furthermore, the current pandemic has led to an increased demand for remote working solutions and video conferencing applications; this means that innovative home companies in India have an opportunity to provide reliable and secure solutions that can help increase productivity. In conclusion, with the increasing demand for innovative home technology in India, smart home companies in 2023 will be of great importance to many households. Here are the top 10 best smart home companies in India in 2023 Wipro Smart Home Solutions – Wipro Smart Home Solutions is a leading provider of cutting-edge home automation solutions. They provide a wide range of solutions, from basic security systems to more advanced solutions such as proactive energy management, home health monitoring and automated climate control. Wipro’s Smart Home Solutions utilizes the latest technologies to provide smart home solutions that are secure, reliable and easy to use. Their products are designed to reduce energy consumption, provide added safety and comfort and even help improve the overall quality of life. Their portfolio of products includes digital door locks, motion sensors, alarm systems, thermostats, surveillance cameras, video doorbells, lighting control systems and access control systems. Wipro’s Smart Home Solutions also include an app-based remote control system that allows users to control their home appliances through voice commands or through the user’s smartphone. This helps users stay connected with their homes even when they are away. Additionally, Wipro also offers energy management solutions for residential customers. These solutions include energy audits, real-time energy tracking, and energy optimization strategies. These solutions help to reduce electricity bills and promote energy efficiency. Furthermore, Wipro also provides invaluable services in terms of customer support and after-sales service. The company has a team of experienced technicians who can be contacted anytime to provide on-site assistance. Wipro also offers a 24/7 helpline to address any queries or concerns regarding their products. Overall, Wipro Smart Home Solutions is a reliable and efficient provider of cutting-edge home automation solutions. They offer secure and easy-to-use solutions that make life easier and help reduce energy consumption. With their excellent customer service and after-sales support, Wipro ensures that their customers always get the best experience. Johnson Controls India – Johnson Controls India is a leading provider of integrated building solutions, energy and controls, fire protection, safety and security systems. The company has been serving the Indian market since 1995. Johnson Controls India designs, installs and maintains a wide range of systems and services for commercial, industrial and residential buildings. Their services include HVAC, lighting and electrical systems, security systems, fire alarm systems, emergency response systems, and energy management systems. They also provide water heating systems, coolers and chillers, air purification systems, air curtains, and air ducting systems. Their expertise includes designing, building and maintaining efficient energy systems and providing accurate and reliable control systems. They use advanced technologies to ensure safe and secure operations of the systems they install and maintain. They have an expert team of engineers and technicians who are always available to provide technical advice as well as after-sales support. The company has received numerous awards and recognitions for its commitment to quality, innovation and customer satisfaction. These include the 2012 International Quality Crown Award, the 2012 Excellence in Quality Award, and the 2013 National Energy Management Award. Johnson Controls India’s commitment to sustainability has earned them Gold Level certification from the Indian Green Building Council (IGBC). They believe in creating long-term benefits for their clients, society and environment and strive to improve their products and services constantly. The company is committed to providing customers with innovative and sustainable solutions that meet their needs. They are committed to providing a high level of service and customer satisfaction and to continuously improving their products and services. Johnson Controls India also works with local partners in order to better serve their customers in India. Honeywell Automation India – Honeywell Automation India Ltd (HAIL) is a subsidiary of Honeywell International Inc. based in Gurgaon, India. It is involved in designing, manufacturing and supplying a wide range of integrated automation products, systems, and solutions for businesses across industries. HAIL focuses extensively on building efficient automation processes and systems to improve production efficiency and quality. The company offers a variety of automation solutions, such as process control, distributed control systems, safety interlocks, fire and gas detectors, field instruments and more. HAIL also provides services like consulting, engineering and project management to ensure clients get the best out of the automation systems they have invested in. In addition to automation products, HAIL also offers IT Solutions like Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, Industrial Internet of Things, Big Data Analytics, and Cloud Computing. These technologies help in managing, monitoring and controlling large-scale operations. HAIL has established strategic partnerships with leading Indian and international companies to ensure that their clients get access to the latest technology. HAIL currently employs more than 2000 people and has offices in more than 30 countries worldwide. The company’s vision is to be the leader in industrial automation, delivering innovative and reliable automation solutions to customers all over the world. They are dedicated to providing cost-effective and efficient automation solutions that make life easier for businesses across different sectors. L&T Technology Services – L&T Technology Services (LTTS) is an engineering services and solutions provider with a global footprint. Founded in 1998, the company has more than 20,000 employees across 30 countries. With over 20 years of industry experience, LTTS provides innovative digital transformation services to leading organizations across Aerospace & Defense, Automotive, Industrial & Medical Devices, Railways & Metros, Hi-tech, Renewable Energy, and Consumer Products & Retail. LTTS helps its customers adopt a holistic approach to technology-enabled strategies, offering a full suite of IT, engineering and product development services from concept to production. The services are aimed at increasing agility, reducing costs and helping customers produce cutting-edge products faster. These cover areas such as 3D printing, cyber security, embedded systems, analytics, augmented reality, artificial intelligence, machine learning, virtual reality, robotics, mechatronics and automation. In addition to its traditional engineering services, LTTS also provides digitalization services, helping clients move from their existing processes to more modern, automated ones. This includes DevOps, cloud computing, IT modernization, data science and analytics, mobility, Internet of Things (IoT), and intelligent system integration. The company’s research initiatives focus on improving customer experiences by integrating emerging technologies. LTTS’ Innovation Centres enable innovation through co-creation, providing a platform for collaboration with customers, partners and the wider ecosystem. Through its commitment to quality, safety and environmental goals, LTTS helps its clients develop products and services that are sustainable, safe, and meet global standards. Highly efficient project execution capabilities have enabled the company to garner recognition for its achievements in engineering excellence. Schneider Electric India – Schneider Electric India is a subsidiary of Schneider Electric, a French multinational corporation that specializes in energy management and automation solutions. Founded in 1997, Schneider Electric India has become one of the most respected names in the power, automation and digital industries in India. The company provides products, services and solutions for industrial, commercial and residential applications, including intelligent building systems, secure data centres, efficient lighting, renewable energy and more. Schneider Electric India also offers differentiated products and services through its two business segments: Schneider Electric India Global and Schneider Electric India Services. With over 2000 employees, Schneider Electric India has become a leader in the field of energy management, both in India and abroad. Its primary focus is to provide energy efficiency solutions that reduce cost, increase productivity and improve safety. Its offering includes integrated solutions such as UPS, switchgear, transformers, motors, automation systems and IT solutions. In addition, the company provides services such as installation and commissioning, monitoring and maintenance, asset management, and training and consulting. Schneider Electric India is committed to sustainable development, and it has implemented several initiatives to support renewable energy, water conservation and responsible resource management. The company works with trusted partners to develop innovative solutions that integrate hardware, software and services. This helps customers reduce their environmental impact while delivering a high level of performance and reliability. Schneider Electric India also supports sustainable innovation by investing in research and development of new technologies. Philips India – Philips India is a leading company in the Indian healthcare sector. It is a subsidiary of the global healthcare giant Royal Philips. The company has been active in the Indian market since 1924 and currently operates in over 100 cities across the country. Philips India offers a wide range of products and services related to health, beauty and lifestyle. Its offerings include medical devices, lighting solutions, consumer electronics, personal care, home appliances and more. The company’s mission is to provide affordable and accessible healthcare solutions to all Indians. To achieve this goal, it has developed products that are tailored to meet the needs of the Indian population. Philips India also provides training and technical support to ensure the quality of its products and services. Philips India has also partnered with several hospitals and other healthcare service providers across the country. This partnership helps in providing quality healthcare to people from all walks of life. Furthermore, Philips India also has research and development centres to create innovative technology and products for the Indian market. In terms of financials, Philips India has reported healthy growth in both revenue and profits in recent years. The company is well-positioned to gain from the growing demand for medical equipment and digital health solutions in India. Philips India also continues to invest in new technologies and products to drive innovation. Tata Power Solar Systems – Tata Power Solar Systems Company is a leading player in the Indian solar energy sector. It is part of the Tata Group, one of India’s oldest and largest conglomerates. The company was established in 1989 and has over three decades of experience in the field. With its headquarter in Mumbai, the company has operations spread across India as well as in many countries around the world. Tata Power Solar Systems Company works with both commercial and residential customers to meet their energy needs. Its services include off-grid and grid-connected solar solutions, energy storage, rooftop solar installation, and energy management services. The company has an extensive portfolio of products, including solar panels, inverters, batteries, water heaters, solar pumps, and solar streetlights. It also provides turnkey solar solutions for various applications, including agricultural, industrial, and commercial. Tata Power Solar Systems Company has a dedicated team of experts who assist clients with project planning, design, engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning, and maintenance. They also ensure that all projects are completed in accordance with the highest standards of safety and quality. The company is certified by several organizations, such as ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, IEC 61215 and IEC 61730 for photovoltaic systems, RSPM certification for Pollution Control Board, and CE Certification for solar PV systems components. Tata Power Solar Systems Company strives to be an active participant in the global effort to reduce emissions and conserve energy. Through its commitment to renewable energy and environmental protection, the company contributes to creating a sustainable future. Siemens India – Siemens India is a leading engineering and technology company in India. Founded in 1922, Siemens India is the Indian arm of the global Siemens Group. With its headquarters in Mumbai, Siemens India has over 160 offices across the country with more than 23,000 employees. In addition to its core businesses of energy, industry, and healthcare, Siemens India is actively involved in innovation, digitalization, and smart infrastructure solutions. Siemens India also provides advanced manufacturing technologies, services, and solutions to boost productivity and efficiency. Furthermore, Siemens India provides innovative and sustainable solutions related to cities, buildings, and transportation, as well as Smart Infrastructure Solutions for the energy sector. Siemens India is committed to developing innovative products and solutions that are reliable and cost-effective for its customers. The company has also achieved several milestones in terms of technological breakthroughs, such as the development of India’s first nuclear power plant. Siemens India has also played an important role in greening India and helping it attain carbon neutrality. It continues to invest in R&D and research activities in order to create cutting-edge products and solutions. Siemens India has won numerous awards for its sustainability initiatives and for its commitment to creating an inclusive workplace for all. Syska Smart Homes – Syska Smart Homes is a technology company that specializes in creating smart home solutions. Founded in 2023, it is one of the leading companies providing intelligent automation and connected lifestyle products to customers across India. Its mission is to provide an intelligent living environment for its customers through world-class technology and innovative design. The company provides a wide range of products, such as smart lighting, security systems, home appliances, smart switches, and more. The products are designed to be user-friendly and feature modern technology, such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, voice control, and cloud support. It is constantly innovating to create new products that make it easier for people to lead smarter and more secure lives. Syska Smart Homes also have a mobile app that allows users to control their devices and access other features remotely. The app can be used to automate tasks, set schedules, manage energy use, and receive alerts when something is out of order. Additionally, it integrates with popular third-party services such as Google Assistant, Alexa, and IFTTT, so users can easily connect to the internet and control their devices from anywhere. To ensure that its products are safe and secure, Syska Smart Homes uses advanced encryption technology, such as AES 128-bit encryption. It also follows international standards such as ISO/IEC 27001 and PCI DSS, which ensures the highest level of data protection and system security. Overall, Syska Smart Homes is dedicated to making people’s lives easier and more comfortable with its innovative products. With its cutting-edge smart home solutions, it has become one of the leading providers of home automation products in India. Havells India – Havells India Company is one of the largest electrical equipment companies in India. Founded in 1958, it is a part of the Havells Group and has a presence in more than 50 countries across the globe. It manufactures a wide range of products, including fans, lighting, switchgear, wires and cables, modular switches, home appliances, electric water heaters, CFL lamps, air conditioners and many more. Havells India is driven by innovation, quality, and performance. It has a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Noida, Uttar Pradesh and many regional offices throughout the country. Their products are designed to meet the needs of customers who value efficiency, convenience, economy, and safety. The company also provides financial assistance to its distributors so that they can grow their business. Havells India offers an extensive range of products that can meet the varying needs of its customers. Its innovative product range includes energy-efficient lighting solutions, industrial switchgear, pumps and motors, and premium ceiling fans. It also offers smart home automation systems and solar power solutions. In addition, Havells India provides an extensive after-sales support network to ensure customer satisfaction. Havells India is committed to providing sustainable and affordable energy solutions for the entire nation. It follows stringent quality processes throughout the manufacturing process and ensures that all products meet international quality standards. With its commitment to customer service, Havells India has become a trusted partner for many leading corporates, institutions, and households. CONCLUSION In 2023, India is one of the world’s leading countries in terms of smart home technology. Many companies are offering a wide range of smart home solutions, from security systems to energy-saving devices. Smart home products are mainly used for convenience, convenience, and energy savings. Companies such as MyGate, D-Link, Honeywell, and HomeLane have become popular in India. They offer products such as door locks, cameras, monitoring systems, and automated lights and air conditioners. These products help make homes more efficient, secure, and comfortable while saving time and money. As the demand for smart home technology increases, more and more companies are entering the market and providing innovative solutions.
